name: Super Jump Soccer
description:
Super Jump Soccer is fast paced arcade football/soccer built using AI & physics powered ragdolls. Inspired by games like Soccer Physics and Dunkers. Responsive, dynamic gameplay with flying bicycle kicks, header deflections, and slide tackles. Featuring a Technos retro inspired art style like NES's Super Dodge Ball in 2.5D.
Players run back and forth for the ball, jumping over each, deflecting the ball with headers, booting it with aerobatic kicks. Dogfighting each other on the ground and in the air, trying to score the next goal past a sport gaming trope invincible AI controlled goalie.
Build your team by beating other teams and trading for players with stronger abilities: bigger, run faster, jump kicker, kick harder. Reach the top tiers of Super Jump Soccer playing against national teams from across the world.

name: Mad Dex
description:
You are about to dive into an exciting adventure in the world of Mad Dex! You are Mad Dex.
You are small, but brave. The love of your life has been kidnapped by a cruel monster who has taken over the city, and now all you can think about is saving her from his vile clutches. Use your special parkour skills to overcome all obstacles, avoid all traps, defeat all bosses, punch your way to the bad monster and save your girlfriend! Test your agility by running, jumping, sticking to walls and fending off the deadly attacks of your evil opponents, never giving up!

name: Puff Go
description:
PuffGo is an on-chain multiplayer royale game that allows players to earn while having fun. The game contains several level themes and gameplay modes that offer players a choice of matchups from solo to multiplayer. Players can collect game characters with different appearances, personalities, abilities, and costumes. Players can also use different characters to participate in various levels of games and modes based on the advantages of each. Multiple skills and strategies matter when you compete with each other for higher ranking and better rewards.
The game aims to allow players to operate various game characters, and provide players with an intriguing and differentiated game experience by trying out diverse themes and levels with varied costumes. We have multiple main characters with distinguishable personalities and nonidentical appearances, each with their own story and customized skills or attributes that play to their strengths in different application scenarios. The team dreams of building an NFT gameverse where players are saturated with entertainment and rewarding experience

New game from the creators of motion puzzle Blueprint 3D and Numerity!
Welcome to the сubic world of Kubiko! Learn to think in 3D as you create awesome creatures and objects from three dimensional pixels in 56 challenging puzzles across 7 level packs. Don’t forget to share your work with your friends and – most importantly – have fun!

name: Golf Skies
description: Golf Skies is a delightful 2D golf game with smooth gameplay and lots of fun twists - You play golf up in the sky where the course is made out of mini planets with their own gravitational fields and obstacles. There's another innovative mechanic too, right after you shoot the ball you are able to steer it and race all the way to the green for a hole in one - as long as you have stamina left!

name: Sanity Break
description: In the roaring 1920s, Arkham City displayed an increasingly thriving scene, but in the darkest den beyond jazz music and bouquet of moonshine’s reach, unnamable evil began secretly. Nightmare-like shadows lurked around every corner, and strange noises echoed from the asylum at night; pagan rituals and witch gatherings frequently arose like never before, behind all these oddities seemed to hide appalling secrets. You, an investigator, have accepted a mysterious commission to explore the truth. May you succeed in stopping the conspiracy in the darkness on the edge of town, ere the Elder Ones’ total awakening... or your sanity’s complete collapse.

name: Stronghold: Warlords - The Warrior Queen Campaign
description: The Warrior Queen Campaign expands the base Stronghold: Warlords game with six missions, two warlords and new achievements. Become a legendary commander of Chinese military history as you launch counter attacks, repel invading tribes and lead the Shang Dynasty to glorious victory.

name: Paintiles
description:
Paint the tiles to make matches and clear the board.

The game starts simple, you are given three colors to paint tiles with. As you gain the skills necessary to solve increasingly challenging puzzles you're faced with new mechanics - dissolving ground, bombs, rainbow tiles, all of which make you think in new and interesting ways. Paintiles is a must for puzzle lovers!

name: The Darkest Tower Defense
description: The Darkest Tower Defense is an independent strategy game whose objective is to prevent the horde of the Soulless from reaching the Sainte Arche, the last bastion of humanity. For this, you must build defenses and position your troops on strategic locations in order to defend the paths of Terre-Croix. However your resources are limited and you will have to adapt your strategy according to the levels.

name: Difficulty
description: Difficulty is a short, experimental visual novel, about both the difficulty level of stories, and the difficulties of real life. The plot, themes, challenges, and morals all become greater and harder to understand and accept as the difficulty increases.

name: Ninneko
description: Ninneko is an enchanting NFT role-playing game on the Binance Smart Chain in which players can earn by nurturing Ninneko, building lineups to defeat enemies through PvP/PvE battles and campaign.

name: War & Romance
description: War & Romance Visual Novel, is a historical fiction story based on Medieval Egypt and Middle East.

name: Super Car
description: How about a nice 3D racing game? Can you race 200 cars? Let's Go.

name: AquaPhobia
description: Work as a team to beat the underwater depths of this weird planet, but be cautious... Some people don't want to work in teams.

name: The Last Dance Saloon
description: The Last Dance Saloon is a VR/PC rhythm shooter. Fight off bounty hunters with your trusty revolvers as you groove to the rhythm of the universe.

name: Sr. Empatia
description: Já teve um rage jogando um jogo de puzzle? Gostaria de ter? Entre no mundo divertido de Sr. Empatia e desfrute de metáforas e puzzles neste jogo 3D/2D.

name: Marinette
description: Marinette is an adventure horror game about a girl who gets trapped inside of a mysterious dollhouse. In her journey she will meet different friends and foes while trying to survive the dangers lurking at every corner. Will she escape alive in time for her birthday?

name: Defenders of Annadale
description: PvP focused 4v4 gameplay. Choose your profession, equip skills, and engage in intense fast paced combat

name: BitUp
description: BitUp is a side scrolling, exploration metroidvania game set in a Cubist-Impressionist universe. A game kept hidden by its legendary creator, while its protagonist looks for answers. Players must aid Bit in its quest to find out what lies beyond.

name: Rings of Saturn: Tungsten Edition
description: Tungsten Edition contains the game, a separate Original Soundtrack package and Tales from the Rings DLC.

name: Clan Wars
description: Clan Wars is an indie multiplayer fast paced mix of RTS and RPG. There are two teams of three players, each start at level 1 and progress their way in an attempt to destroy the opponents cave troll. The game features dragons, cave trolls, skeleton archers and minotaur's. All player stats including currency and experience are saved for progression with the ability to unlock new heroes.

name: Shin Mahjong Tenka Fubu
description: 戦国時代に信じる者は己のみ！がキーワード！ 麻雀とシミュレーションゲーム要素を同時に楽しみたい方に待望の麻雀ゲーム 『真 麻雀天下布武』がSteamに登場いたしました！

name: Northgard: Dodsvagr, Clan of the Rat

description: Don't Starve: Newhome brings a new Don't Starve adventure to your phone! Craft, survive, and explore with your friends! A mysterious new survival adventure is on the way! The new mobile game, developed by Shengqu Games, will expand on the core survival, exploration, and crafting gameplay that Don't Starve is known for while introducing social and multiplayer elements that expand gameplay in exciting new ways.

name: Watermelon Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Fellowship
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Combat Online
description: Star Combat is an online space shooter, as well as a genre of action packed simulator for free. A flexible aircraft customization system will capture your attention to the details of the combat vehicle technical equipment and allow you to create your own style of play, while the furious dynamics, drive and action of space battles with real rivals will not let you to be bored. In the game, you will encounter 18 warships, each of them has its own potential that you need to disclose.

name: Vtuber Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: Nine Hearts
description: Sin descripción

name: Pebble End
description: Sin descripción

name: Jump 'n' Run VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Form
description: Sin descripción

name: Bury Treasure
description: A game where you hide stolen treasures (oh: there's also a bomb).

name: Boom! Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Wizard
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyber Tennis
description: This game is a VR tennis game that offers a realistic tennis experience. You can play against other players, develop your character, enter the tour to get the ranking, and more.

name: Zenite
description: Hero, Furtive and Brute trained for four years. Now, the destruction of Inbrazed Village will be heroic, furtive or brutally avenged. But it depends on the focus on the goal and, who knows, maybe find, arrive or reach the zenith...

name: We Hidden
description: A 2D Top Down Hide and Seek Strategy game with cute chameleons!.

name: Covid Simulator
description: Covid Simulator is an outbreak simulation that visualizes how quickly Covid-19 spreads, becoming a disaster. The game is an open sandbox where you can add (or remove) Covid mandates and see what happens! Create your workplace, enact your mandates, and roll the dice with your workers.

name: A Lost Jellyfish: Return to its Parents
description: A very short and memorable adventure of this above jellyfish kid to finding his parents. Use your mouse click to avoid the sea predators and eat planktonics. The story is a little cringey but will make you smile in the end.

name: Anges & Gardiens: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: Explore the depths of the Earth, collect resources and fight for your survival. Your choices will be decisive and your will will be put to the test. Reach the Center of the Earth in an attempt to save humanity!

name: Nineteen
description: Nineteen is a 3D action game inspired by the COVID-19 pandemic, where players will explore the body of a young man as a vaccine and help him return to his normal everyday life.

name: Hardworking Hero
description: [Hardworking Hero] Is an exploratory idle game with pixel art. Earn the money by exploring maps and build buildings. Develop your adventurer to face powerful mobs. Don't forget, this game is about making money!

name: Dive Bar Superstars
description: Play as members of the real life rock band DZ DEATHRAYS as you work your way up from backyard parties to the main stage while bringing in the cheers and dodging the flying beers! Its an original twist on a classic 2d pixel art based beat-em-up that will have you head banging all the way to the top.

name: Cosmic Invasion
description: Cosmic Invasion is a combination of strategy mixed in with quick frantic battles against fleets that contain many ships. The strategic layer is a 20 X 30 grid with 600 sectors. Move your ships around to protect your home planet and space stations from the invading fleets of UFO ships.

name: Shibadungeon
description: Shibadungeon is a turn-based dungeon crawler that you can play with friends!

name: Puzzle Box
description: A cute little indiegame where the goal is to go through all the levels and reach the cake, but be quick! The crow might get the before you, and maybe you have to shapeshift into something different to be quicker.

name: WindWind
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Knight
description: Bad Dudes have taken over the Kingdom and taken the Princess. The Villagers have left. Save The Princess ! Save the World !

name: Spirittracker
description: A zelda-style action/adventure game with light RPG elements. Light humor, pixel graphic old-style combat.

name: Nebular Crush
description: Intense 80s style 2D shooter with a cyber psychedelic aesthetic

name: Midnight Rush
description: Short and Addictive

name: The Right Shot
description: Become the new little waiter of the evil bar The Right Shot and challenge the bartender !

name: The Insector
description: Enter the world of San-Francicado with Inspector Phillip Mothlowe and his partner Buggsy as they solve the mysterious crimes that have been plaguing the once peaceful city.

name: Smuggler: 30XX
description: observe. lie. profit.

name: Void Slayer
description: Void Slayer is a fast-paced shooter with a unique twist, where the arena is also your health. Armed only with your magic gloves, fight through countless hordes of enemies, advance your power and fight to avoid falling into the Void.

name: The Great War of Jorth
description: The Great War of Jorth (GWOJ) has the look and sound of a classic 16-bit JRPG. It will satisfy the nostalgic itch of any gamer that remembers playing the greats of the 16-bit era. Our fully voiced game will immerse you in a rich story where the outcome is determined by your choices.

name: Infinite Voyager
description: Far from Earth, mankind hasn't changed in the centuries since we've reached the stars. Across this wide-open galaxy, you'll find merchants, builders, and explorers. The more adventurous are colonizers, conquerors, and even space pirates. And you, Voyager? What will you be?

name: Vault of Stars
description: An adventure across the mysterious Islands of Souls. Embark on a journey to bring light back to these darkened islands, restoring the patterns of the Guardians by solving astral puzzles, engaging in magical, fast-paced combat with shadowy creatures, and uncovering the history of a ruined world.

name: Pastaghi
description: Are you the one to save them?

name: Velocimom
description: Collect as many snacks as you can without getting caught by Velocimom!

name: Mercury Island
description: First person dreamlike island exploration

name: I, Bag
description: A mystery visual novel in theme of reincarnation and science-fiction. Opposite to other game, you are not the hero takes item bag, you are the bag yourself! You forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items to change the fate of heros. Has 200 endings and 30+ hours main story.

name: Cuboton
description: You are ordered to destroy a secret laboratory on the planet Cuboton. Complete the mission by fighting hordes of mutated creatures and find out what caused their existence.

name: Canvas of a Rainy Day
description:
It will rain today. It rains all the time these days.
This is a story of protagonist who delivers a painting tool to another person who draws a paining.

name: Air Force 1943
description: Take off and shoot down everything that flies

name: War of the Monsters
description: Sin descripción

name: Ryzer: The Reflectors Path
description: In another normal day of his job as a space engineer, Ryzer is going to fix a space prison ship and things don't go his way. In Ryzer: The Reflectors Path, help Ryzer find the best path through the reflectors in this futuristic puzzle and finally just complete his job.

name: Dimension Shifter
description: Dimension Shifter is an action adventure platform game. As you explore a magical and challenging world while following a gripping story, you can engage in a relentless collision with the inhabitants of this world.

name: Kratoria
description: Kratoria is an upcoming RTS/City-Building Game with RPG and Roguelike Elements, set in the world of Antiquity.

name: Forest
description: Forest is a survival game with an open world, good optimization, graphics and beautiful nature.

name: Red Bash
description: Red Bash is a difficult, retro-styled precision platformer with one catch: use the enemies projectiles to your advantage. Redirect them to destroy obstacles or boost yourself to even greater heights. Master over 45 tight, handcrafted stages in multiple environments that offer different challenges.

name: Pry into the Void
description: A bleak monster-taming RPG where you pry into the hearts of monsters and people. Exploit enemy weaknesses, converse with their souls and navigate challenging moral dilemmas to recruit abstract monsters as your allies.

name: Rome 2077: Tactics
description: Turn-based strategy in a space Sci-Fi setting. Capture star systems, fight in tactical battles on hexagonal maps, upgrade your mother ship, discover new technologies and conquer the entire galaxy!

name: Milo
description: Milo is a horror game where the player will find himself trapped in dungeons from which he will have to escape. And in crossing the various caves and catacombs, you will have to be careful not to run into one of the monsters that populate them, including skeletons, zombies and werewolves.

name: Survive the Hill
description: Survive The Hill TPS Survive the Hill is an assymetrical multiplayer/co-op survival experience that supports 1v4 to 2v8 options (customizable to PLAYERS liking) and vs. AI scenarios.

name: John's Tombstone
description: Drive inside a dream, explore one of Saturn's moons, and discover the afterlife. John's Tombstone is a walking simulator; a story split in three chapters, each chapter very different from the other. This game is a digital eulogy to my dad.

name: The Game
description: The right path or the left path? Which will you choose? To get the Free Pass and finish the game you have to make an important choice.

name: Wraith VR
description: Sin descripción

name: VEV: Viva Ex Vivo - VR Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Deliria
description: Sad? Lonely? Come to DELIRIA, a special bar where EVERYONE is welcome! If you're lost... You might even find your true self! Choose a drink and get ready for revelations! Make friends with peculiar characters, from all colors of the rainbow! And stay for the show of a lifetime!

name: Mirror of Immortality
description: Mirror of Immortality is an online game of real-time combat and survival adventure. Each player has only one life. Please be careful with your choice every time.

name: Kill to Live
description: Your health decreases with every second and extermination of enemies is the most effective way to restore it. Don't sit still if you want to stay alive.

name: The Monstrous Frontier
description: A turn based city biulder, where you have to manage increasingly complex production lines, attract adventurers to your city and create Quests to protect yourself instead of controlling them directly.

name: Pengu Never Left
description: A small game about a penguin named Pengu who lives on a tiny island. Fish and relax as the days pass by.

name: Aboard the Adventure
description: Aboard the adventure is a humorous adventure game in which you will be part of the team of the daring Captain Quinn, with the objective of defeating the sinister Professor Weaver in a race to get several ancient and mysterious artifacts that can change the destiny of the world.

name: Straight Ahead
description: Rage deathrun-platformer with a twist.

name: The Cruel Dreamer Marchosias
description: Join Wolf on their mission to right the atrocity committed against their family. Together with the mysterious entity 'Book', Wolf will brave the monsters lurking in the shadows, explore long-forgotten ruins and solve mysterious puzzles in order to reach an ancient castle located between worlds.

name: Our Life: Now & Forever
description: A paper airplane, two new neighbors, four autumns, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience that’s all your own in this near-fully customizable, choice-heavy story where you grow from childhood to adulthood.

name: Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic
description: In Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic, robot duo B0-3 and 0-R4 engage in turn-based combat, 2D platforming, and physics-based environmental puzzles, as they embark on an epic, alien-infested adventure through an urban wasteland known as The Nec.

name: Amazing Machines
description: Puzzle game in which players must arrange the parts of machines and set them in motion.

name: Impulsive Force
description: Top-down arcade game requiring awareness of the rotation of all controllable guns. The guns may help or hinder the progression of the puck to the target zone. Although one gun may be the player's primary focus consideration should be given to upcoming behaviour caused by items in their periphery.

name: Master Lander
description: Master Lander is a hard-to-beat 2d physics driven landing game with a centric gravity. You take on a role of remote lander pilot. Your task is to bring the lander from the orbit down to the surface of each of 27 different exoplanets. In order to achieve high score award you need to hover close to alien artifacts scattered on the planets before landing precisely in designated zone. By controlling the thrust of two rocket engines you need to adjust your velocity in order to descend from the orbit and land softly on the landing pad. Watch your fuel, altitude and attitude to land like a pro!

name: Take Me to the Moon
description: Sin descripción

name: Gravitation
description: A planet pulling puzzle game

name: Freeze the Core
description: A cross-sectional geological jumper

name: GraviTV
description: A platformer where you can control gravity

name: Tilt'N'Turn
description: A game about puzzles and physics

name: Conquer or Die
description: Roguelike deckbuilding dungeon crawler.

name: Solarpunk: Failed States
description: Reverse global warming while stopping starvation and civil war

name: Gravitum
description: Game in an atomic universe based on gravity.

name: Ubiquatopia
description: Card-based strategy game.

name: Strewn Runes
description: Build a deck to defeat arcane abominations in this card-based battler

name: The Gristmill
description: Tactical Deckbuilding Strategy

name: Card Adventure
description: Explore a uniquely generated world, fight monsters with cards and build up a kingdom.

name: Jump Us
description:
Have you ever wondered where the crew members expelled from the ship go.
The answer is, they have to compete for their survival, in a series of minigames, where they have to get 100 points for each game, jump, skate and fly.

name: These are not Heroes
description: These are not Heroes is a shmup + deckbuilder with 4 unique heroes and 146 cards to collect. It's in development, so your feedback on bugs and balance is greatly appreciated!

name: ForceBerg
description: Can a can? No, can can not can!

name: Infinitree
description: A relaxing game in which you play as a leaf falling down an infinitely tall tree.

name: Inverted
description: A co-op platforming experience designed for two players. Are you ready to defy gravity?

name: Cattenburg
description: Lead a party of cats on adventures in a beautifully illustrated and original card combat game.

name: Kick Your Astronaut
description: Couch Multiplayer Mayhem!

name: The Dark Throne
description: A roguelite deck building card game with a grimy sci-fi setting

name: Slay the Space
description: Slay The Spire Like Deck-building game

name: Space Crafter
description: A game about crafting ships to fight the aliens.

name: Zoo's Mad
description: Deck Building / Roguelite / Systemic Card Game

name: Curse of the Spookz: Hidden Island
description: PG Spooky Pirate Island Adventure!

name: Godmorgon: Spooky Ride
description: Sin descripción

name: Uda Game
description: Explore the unknown dungeons full of treasure, doors and rooms. But keep in mind the creatures guards this place.

name: Two Handed Mage
description: Deck-building roguelike shooter!

name: Christmas Morning
description: Sin descripción

name: Troubled Waters
description: A top-down 2D ship combat adventure with active crew management

name: Arcadebnb
description: Get carried away by the real estate fever in an arcade way.

name: Aventia
description: Fast paced card combat and deckbuilding meets a story-driven campaign

name: Debugger 4406
description: Deck-building cyberpunk adventure game

name: Surrounded
description: Surrounded is an up to 6-player cooperative horror game where you will encounter a lot of different variations of paranormal activities, strange sightings, and creatures capable of ending your life. Grab your gear, and be ready to experience the strange mystery of the Surrounded world.

name: Worland: Dungeons
description: Worland is an adventure game, where you can build your own base, and clear dungeons.

name: Post fur Ritter Rost
description: Post für Ritter Rost is a puzzle game for children aged 6 to 10 based on the German Ritter Rost franchise of children's books with a musical audio disc included.

name: Retrievable
description:
Retrievable is an exploration game with the focus on relaxation.
You can explore different levels within which nothing can kill you.

Explore different levels, about 5 hours of gameplay.
Mini-story: An important emerald was stolen and has to be retrieved.
Re-play value: Some game elements, like items, are randomly placed in the level. So each new game is different.

name: Castle Escape
description: 'Castle Escape' is a 2D action Metroidvania with a brutal combat system. Discover the dark secrets, find treasures, and explore dangerous dungeons. Fight your way through the cursed castle, find treasures, upgrade skills, execute the damned souls and unravel the mystery of this once mighty castle.

name: Scare Crow
description: Sin descripción

name: Tadpole Tap
description:
Reach the skies with your favorite tadpole while eating flies with your tongue!
With piranhas constantly on your tail, you must hurry and pull your way through dangerous obstacles!

name: Era of War
description:
Have guts? Join and show off your leadership!

Build and upgrade your army to conquer the World

Construct and facilitate your base to fend of raiders.

Forge a mighty Clan with worldwide players.

Lead you Clan to resounding triumph. A great leader always comes up with great strategies!

name: Project Umbra
description: Project Umbra is a twin sticks shooter game set in a colored voxel world. Travel back in time to destroy enemies and score!

name: Bushi
description: Wield your bow and sword against fierce opponents as you navigate obstacles with dynamic parkour in the samurai-themed arena brawler, Bushi! Inspired by the cult classic GunZ The Duel and The Legend of Son-Goku.

name: Kuma: The Environmental Protector
description: A fantasy based Action-RPG game with main hero Kuma the bear. Aside from being a bear Kuma is also The Environmental Protector with the mission to protect the forest from pollution by killing all humans. The game contains fast paced combat along with jumping puzzles and clever mechanics.

name: Incredible Dracula 4: Game of Gods - Collector's Edition
description: Incredible Dracula IV - Game of Gods Collector's Edition puts you face-to-face in a thrilling showdown with a god. Outsmart the deity with your wit, humor, and strategy. Featuring drop-dead gorgeous visuals and a story that will keep you in stitches, this is one strategic journey you won't soon forget. Discover Incredible Dracula IV - Game of Gods Collector's Edition today!

name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook - Collector's Edition
description: Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own!

name: Red Johnson's Chronicles 1+2
description: You play the role of Red Johnson, a private detective who is trying to find his place in the corrupted city of Metropolis. You are taken on by the police who want you to solve a murder with no corpse.

name: The Gift
description: A young female psychic searches for redemption while tracking down a killer in The Gift, an unforgettable detective thriller.

name: New Yankee 8: Journey of Odysseus - Collector’s Edition
description: Join the world's best traveled-couple on a time-tripping adventure to return home!

name: Rescue Team 10: Danger from Outer Space! - Collector's Edition
description: Stop an alien threat from wreaking untold devastation on Earth! After a meteor strikes Florida and releases strange spores, weird plants begin to grow and destroy entire cities! Worse, the pieces of the meteorite are emitting a bizarre form of radiation that reduces people to a stupor! Only the Rescue Team has the skills to deal with this menace from outer space!

name: Song of Memories: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Song Of Memories
- Original Drama CD (4CD)
- Limited Booklet

name: Golden Force: Mercenary Edition
description: The King of Demons set his sights on Muscle Island, a paradisaical and peaceful place where it’s good to live. This evil person settled his army and persecutes the population with the help of his generals.

name: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Devious Dungeon: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Devious Dungeon Collector’s Box
- Devious Dungeon Game (region free)
- Devious Dungeon Original Soundtrack
- Devious Dungeon Numbered Certificate

name: Natural Doctrine: Omochidashi Pack
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Natural Doctrine
- PS Vita Game: "Natural Doctrine" (DLC)

name: Sengoku Hime 5: Senka Tatsu Haou no Keifu - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Sengoku Hime 5: Senka Tatsu Haou no Keifu
- Original Novel Book
- Clear Bookmark Set (4pcs)

name: E School Life: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- E School Life
- B2 tapestry
- Acrylic key chain
- Illustration message card
- Theme song CD

name: Sphere: Flying Cities - Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Opus: Collector's Edition
description:
Opus: Collector's Edition includes:

- Opus: The Day We Found Earth - The Game
- Opus: The Day We Found Earth - Original Soundtrack
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - The Game
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Original Soundtrack
- Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Official Artbook with Bonus World Map
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Artbook
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.1
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.2
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.1
- Opus: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.2

name: Modern Naval Warfare
description: Modern Naval Warfare is the next generation naval combat simulator, which will immerse you in the dark and unforgiving world of the modern high-tech naval battlefield.

name: Ideology in Friction: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Storm of Arrows
description: Field of Glory II: Storm of Arrows is a turn-based tactical game set in the High Middle Ages and it's the third DLC for Field of Glory II: Medieval. Developed by the legendary Richard Bodley Scott it brings the best from the tabletop world into the best digital framework.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Jarl Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Centurion Edition
description:
Vagrus - The Riven Realms Centurion Edition includes:
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms Patronage Pack
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms Soundtrack
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Vorax
- Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Seekers of Knowledge

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Adeptus Mechanicus
description: A new faction joins the war for Gladius Prime. The Adeptus Mechanicus are an empire within the Imperium, with their own agenda, their own god (‘The Omnissiah’) and their own fanatical purpose—the discovery of knowledge, of technology.

name: Neptunia: Virtual Stars - VIP Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cleo: A Pirate's Tale - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Star Varnir: Complete Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Core Worlds
description: New worlds are ripe for the conquering in Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation! In Core Worlds, you will face down your enemies on a series of new maps based on real-world geographic locations.

name: Stronghold: Warlords - The Mongol Empire Campaign
description: The Mongol Empire Campaign expands the base Stronghold: Warlords game with six missions, two new warlords and extra achievements. Play as emperor Kublai Khan as you relive famous sieges, civil war and skirmishes against the Song Dynasty.

name: Moero Chronicle: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Stronghold: Warlords - Rise of the Shogun Campaign
description: The Rise of the Shogun Campaign expands the base Stronghold: Warlords game with six missions, two new warlords and extra achievements. Relive historical conflicts from The Battle of Uji in 1180 AD, through to the culmination of the Genpei War and founding of the Kamakura shogunate.

name: Ultimate ADOM: Caverns of Chaos - Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Layers of Fear: Digital Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: A Juggler's Tale: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Elements
description: Elements is a beautiful, 3rd-person, open-world adventure game about two siblings fulfilling their destiny. Go in search of 8 elemental stones to uncover magic and mystery. And restore balance to the Elemental world and ours.

name: Death End Re;Quest 2: Complete Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Love Beyond Death
description: The demonic invasion cut many lives short without warning. The unstoppable catastrophe brought death to all in equal measure — rich and poor, fortunate and unfortunate, young and old.

name: The Clutch: Remastered
description: The Clutch Remastered is a remake of The Clutch. It's a modern day FPS where you fight for the top spot on the leaderboard. Get levels to unlock guns, operators and more!

name: Shape TD
description: A Tower Defense game, where geometric shapes face each other, and you, the Leader of the Order, must carefully plan your time and money to defeat enemies. With a minimalist design, this is the game for those looking to relax and at the same time train their agility and logical thinking.

name: Diaspora
description:
Diaspora is a 3D side scrolling adventure game.

The end has come to the world with the predicted disaster.
Explore a world full of chaos and despair and survive

Experience stages and various puzzle mechanisms with the theme of various places such as deserts, farmland, and cities.
Experience a new type of side scrolling adventure game centered on the story.

name: Momotaro Dentetsu World Remote Play
description: Momotaro Dentetsu World is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games genre by Hudson Soft for mobile phones.

name: Raskopnik: The Trench Warrior
description: Raskopnik: The Trench Warrior it's not just grid-based roguelike game in World War II setting. This is the shrill story about valiant adventure of brave soviet sergeant against Nazi's horde. The story about the Trench Warrior who is destined to squash the Reich and save the Motherland on his own.

name: BlindSight Event Zero
description: A platform fighter with a deep and creative combo system built on fluid movement that is easy to pick up and rewarding to master

name: Party Paradise
description:
A cancelled strategy sim game where you would organize parties.

Release was supposed to be Q1 2002.

name: Ishin no Arashi: Shippuu Ryoma-den
description: Ishin no Arashi: Shippuu Ryoma-den is the third entry in the Ishin no Arashi series. Like Mouri Motonari: Chikai no Sanshi, the game was released in the same year as a similarly themed Taiga drama.

name: Ishin no Arashi: Bakumatsu Shishi-den
description:
Ishin no Arashi: Bakumatsu Shishiden is the second entry in the Ishin no Arashi series. Unlike its predecessor, historical figures are now characterized with personalities and the script carries a contemporary tone.

This game was first released at the same time as the Taiga drama, Tokugawa Yoshinobu. Both mediums take place during the Bakumatsu and extend into the Meiji period. It is also the first Koei title to include this shogun as a character.

name: Dragoncrest RPG: Arc 1
description: Adventures await you in the lands of the Dragoncrest Empire. Set out in search of fame, fortune and mastery of the many adventurer skills in this Zero-to-Hero Adventure RPG series! Brought to you by a team of fellow gaming enthusiasts with a passion for the RPG Genre and playing Dungeons & Dragons. The games in this series are designed like playable volumes of a Light Novel written in the expandable story style of a D&D Campaign.

name: Gua-Le-Ni
description:
Gua-Le-Ni, also known as "The Horrendous Parade" is an action puzzle.
The game takes place on the desk of a British taxonomist, as he goes through a book representing mystical creatures (inspired by mixing body parts from real world animals) the player has to use taxonomic cubes to put together syllables, and give the mystical creatures, the right name.

Gua-Le-Ni is the first commercially-released casual video game whose development and tuning were guided by the analysis of its players' psychophysiological responses.

name: Projekt Melody: A Nut Between Worlds!
description: Projekt Melody: A Nut Between Worlds! is a high-quality next-gen hentai game, a 3D sci-fi dating Game with roleplay elements.

name: WALL-E 2
description: WALL-E 2 is a cancelled sequel to the Nintendo DS game movie tie-in game WALL-E, which was developed by Helixe before being cancelled in November 2008 after they were shut down by THQ. Nothing is known about what the game was going to be about, with the only details about the gameplay surfacing online being that it would've featured a local co-op mode that contained multiple playable characters from the movie.

name: Bapbap
description: Bapbap is a MOBA battle royale game. Choose from a diverse cast of iconic characters, be the last survivor standing, and join your friends to reign victorious with your team.

name: Tamriel Rebuilt
description: Tamriel Rebuilt is a long-running fan effort to expand the borders of The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind beyond the cut-down area shipped with the original 2002 game. Although incomplete, interested players are encouraged to download the mod and play through its hundreds of hours of content, the fruit of nearly two decades of work.

name: Sunday Sundae
description: Make a tasty ice-cream sundae!

name: Pinni and the Lost Voice
description: Pinni and the Lost Voice is a classic adventure platformer with a cute hand-drawn art style. Play as Pinni, a brave little doggy in a mysterious dreamland where the sun and the moon have stopped moving!

name: Worst World
description: Worst World is a Hardcore zombie multiplayer survival game. Survive in a post apocalyptic world, collect resources and set up camps. Make friends or join a micro society of survivors. The World does not give you a gift. No crosshair, menu, life bar. You can be happy to breathe and to have spent the night every day.

name: The Periwink
description: It's your last day as her ladyship's groundskeeper - but you still have a little work left to do.

name: Genzee NFT Game
description: Genzee is a collection of 10,001 unique collectibles living in the Ethereum blockchain. Can your Genzee make it through to the end?

name: Outbuddies
description: Run, gun and explore an open undercity in this otherworldly non-linear Metroidvania adventure about the Old Gods, strange creatures and the remnants of a lost world!

name: Zarts
description:
Zarts is 2D turn-based battle games.
You can customize and upgrade each characters for fight various enemies.

name: Time Loader and Biped Bundle

name: City of Gangsters: Atlantic City
description: Expand your gambling operations to attract high-rollers to Atlantic City casinos in this new high-stakes expansion!

name: Opus: Rocket of Whispers - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong - Deluxe Edition
description: OPUS: Echo of Starsong Deluxe Edition includes 4 items: OPUS: Echo of Starsong, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Artbook, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Complete Soundtrack, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script.

name: Yaga: Armful Edition
description: Play as Ivan, a one-handed blacksmith with incredibly bad luck, who must take on the impossible tasks given to him by the tzar. All the while the mysterious witch, Baba Yaga, watches over Ivan's fate.

name: Crying Suns: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Game: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Shift
description: You will play as a game designer at a small game studio based in California, USA on his late shift. You have to print the report for today but weird things start happening. Will you have the courage to work alone in the office?

name: Onlooker
description: Explore the secrets of Hotel Victoria through peepholes

name: Brickscape
description: A 3D puzzler requiring the player to remove a rectangular block from a cube by moving other rectangular blocks from the path.

name: Picture Puzzle
description: Picture Puzzle is a puzzle game for the MSX released in 1983. The goal is to reconstruct an image that is cut into 16 different pieces one of which is not present. You can reconstruct 5 different images of which are a crocodile, cat, pig, horse, and elephant.

name: Circuroid
description: Circuroid is a fast-paced arcade shooter where you must defend the perimeter from the endless onslaught of asteroids.

name: Dig This!
description: Just dig with your fingers — and guide the ball to the cup. It's easy, yet challenging. There is often a trick to solve the levels, sometimes you need take advantage of the objects' speed, sometimes you need to make objects collide, but often it is enough to use your intuitive thinking.

name: Polarized! MonkeyBox 1
description:
A story driven by your camera.

What happened that winter night?
Uncover the secrets with your camera.

Enjoy your first photo mystery: A game controlled by the pictures you take.

name: Balance Stuff
description:
Balance Stuff is a physics-based game where stacking and placing objects based on your choice will provide the most soothing and calming feeling ever.

The art is created in a manner to represent a very relaxing mood. And there is no shortage of content here. We have more than 300 levels of Balancing fun ready to play through.

name: Roman Triumph
description: At the northern fringes of the empire, a new Roman city is born! Manage and grow your city, please the gods, and survive against barbarians and mythological threats to achieve Roman Triumph!

name: Storm: Lost Normality
description: Curve the space-time continuum to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles.

name: The Paper Mario Christmas Special
description: Paper Mario Christmas Special is a ROM Hack of Paper Mario. It was developed by Rain, Alex, Fish, Fewffwa, and Den of the Paper Mario Modding Discord.

name: Punk Wars: Hold the Line
description: Sin descripción

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Ultimate Edition
description: Become a legend on the battlefields of the Trojan War and save 40% with the Ultimate Edition! This action-packed bundle includes the base game, MYTHOS Expansion Pack, new Rhesus & Memnon DLC and more. Strike fast – you only have until 5th January 2022!

name: Wolfstride: Golden God Edition
description: The ultimate prize for aspiring Golden God champions: this bundle includes the Wolfstride base game, exclusive wallpapers showcasing the game's stunning art, the OST featuring over fifty unique tracks, and a script giving fans unique insights into the game.

name: House Flipper Bundle
description: Base Game + Garden DLC + HGTV DLC + Luxury DLC

name: Europa Universalis IV: Empire Bundle
description: The Empire Bundle is the ultimate package for aspiring conquerors. Including every major expansion for the game, up to and including 2020's Emperor, the Empire bundle gives you everything you need to rewrite early modern history.

name: Net_Defender
description:
Prepare to enter the Net. The name for the internet in the year 2119 after it has become overcome by malicious software and hackers.

Use your ship to fight off malware and take back the net

name: A Classical Kickabout
description: The beautiful game just got even more artful. A Classical Kickabout is a local multiplayer football based tug of war taking place within a gallery hosting art from around the world.

name: Patrol Against Space Sabotage
description: Fight against the wretched aliens in the everyday battles of PASS as they use everything in their arsenal to endlessly fend off the evil species from Planet Disguzk i.e. a purple metallic dog, a green bulb & a rotten red donut!

name: Boxes
description: After the death of her mother, a woman returns home to confront the painful memories of her past.

name: G-Switch 3+
description:
G-Switch 3+ is the definitive version of the popular gravity runner, for PC.

Play solo, or with up to 8 players on one keyboard!

Includes all 21 multiplayer maps in the series, fullscreen HD graphics and improved performance.

name: Red Ball Evolved
description: Collect the coins and save the town. Solve challenges, defeat enemies and destroy evil boss.

name: Lightfield: Kartridge Edition
description: Explore beyond the boundaries of a traditional racing experience and sink into the striking visuals and hypnotic electro soundtrack.

name: Bit Adventure
description: Bit adventure-created by indie Studio Lord Game LLC, and is a casual arcade game. The game boasts Multiplatforms, it works both in the browser and on all operating systems.

name: Landshay: Event Night
description:
Immerse yourself in the epic action world and pass the test in the adventure game.

Avoid dangers, run away from wild animals, overcome obstacles to advance further inside the mysterious world. Find secret locations in each level.

name: The Fall of Rallys Factory: Episode 2 - It's for Science
description: Help William to get out of Factory , but just watch out for the monsters that live in the shadows

name: Doodle God: Fantasy World of Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: Shooterwave
description: Do you like the VAPORWAVE style? If yes, like me, then I believe that you should play this game, which contains nice music, nice graphics and a shooter. Enjoy it!

name: Lenny!
description: Lenny is a kid-friendly, first person collection of mini-games inspired by Baldi's Basics, Rockstar's Bully, Chex Quest, late 90s/early 2000s Cartoon Network/Nickelodeon, and the sound design of the NES/Atari 2600/SNES chipsets.

name: Galactic Gladiators
description: Warriors from all over the galaxy came to these gladiatorial fights, including ... mushroom? a stone? it seems that the great wars are too busy for our battles of epic proportions.

name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada - Deluxe Edition
description: Battle for the control of the Gothic sector in Battlefleet Gothic: Armada Deluxe Edition, including the base game and the Original Soundtrack.

name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 - Deluxe Edition
description: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 - Deluxe Edition, includes the base game and the Official Soundtrack.

name: Red Embrace: Paradisus
description: Red Embrace: Paradisus is an immersive vampire sim/narrative RPG. RE:P seeks to create a dark, fully story-driven vampire experience with branching narrative and multiple endings.

name: Squad Battles: The Proud and the Few
description:
Squad-level wargame set in WW2 Pacific Theater that focuses on the battles of the United States Marines against the forces of Japan. Relive those glorious moments of the Marine history in their victorious advance from one island to another. From Guadalcanal to Okinawa, and even to the shores of the Japanese home islands, join the fight to ultimate victory.
The Proud and the Few includes 46 Scenarios, including Wake Island, Tarawa, Guadalcanal, Iwo Jima, and others, covering all sizes and situations.

Included are 23 unique maps ranging in size from 390 hexes to 77,028 hexes, covering many of the island hopping operations in the Pacific theater.

The Order of Battles include US Army, US Marine, Japanese Army and Japanese Naval soldiers.

Unit component, Order-of-Battle and Scenario Editors which allow players to customize the game.

Map & Sub-map editors allowing map creation and any of the included maps to be "chopped" up into smaller segments for custom scenario creation.

The Proud and the Few provides multiple play options including play against the computer AI, Play by E-mail (PBEM), LAN & Internet "live" play, and two player hot seat.

name: Juqueision
description: Juqueision new multiplayer game, Bing bang, start season, have fun with your friends in games of nine players per room, select the machine and enjoy this early version, share it and help us grow and develop new gaming experiences;).invite your friends to play with you.

name: Slash & Roll
description: Join an online RPG multiplayer game and roll dice to face off against other guilds! Play with friends online in epic co-op battles. Fight in multiplayer PvP team battles against other guilds to dominate the ranking! It’s just the beginning of what Slash & Roll, one of the most interesting online multiplayer games with friends, has to offer!

name: Retro First Friday Collection #4
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro First Friday Collection #3
description: Sin descripción

name: I'm Not Jelly
description:
Use the best Nojellian warriors in a war between jelly-like creatures and their plant-like enemies, in battles full of vibrantly colorful violence!
A skill-based rogue-lite, explore different planets composed of rooms with objectives to complete.

name: MetaOps
description:
Join the battlefield and team up with your friends to put your tactical skills to the test within MetaOps, a first-person shooter built on Unity. Game Modes: Multiplayer, Campaign (soon) and Battle Royale (soon)

MetaOps harnesses the power of blockchain gaming, providing players with ownership of their earned assets to keep, trade or sell.

name: DJ Beats: Waifus
description: DJ Beats: Waifus is a rythme game with stunning synthwave songs and dozens of items to unlock! Collect BEATS and spend them to unlock them for your profile!

name: Illusory Dreamlight 1: Deprimerie
description: A short RPG which follows the adventures of Tyson, who's put into a weird world after having a strange encounter with a kitchen sink and a house fire. He soon learns he must travel this strange land and save this world, or fall to the power of Nightmare and erode away.

name: Squad Battles: Pacific War
description:
Squad-level wargame set in WW2 Pacific Theater. From Nomonhan in Russia to the jungles of Burma, Pacific War enables you to replay the history of World War II in the Pacific.
60 scenarios covering the entire Pacific Theater in World War II involving forces from the Chinese (both Nationalist and Communist), Dutch, Soviet, Australian, British, US, and the Japanese.
3 campaigns allow you to play the role of a commander during the war in the Pacific as either Australian, American, or Japanese.

name: Adventure Roll
description:
Adventure Roll is a fully immersive 3D virtual tabletop for D&D 5e that combines the functionality of a VTT with the visuals of a video game to deliver the online D&D experience you've been waiting for.

Dungeon masters can customize maps, place interactive traps, props, puzzles, and animated NPCs to set up homebrewed adventures within minutes. They can control the action from any angle, keep adventure notes, utilize a suite of tools via our integrated user interface, and even play alongside their players in 1st or 3rd person. The platform comes with embedded 5th edition rules, game mechanics, and automated dice roll calculations with character sheet updates to make game administration easy. Players can explore the world through the eyes of personalized, animated avatars that they can control in 1st or 3rd person. They can interact with objects, launch lifelike attacks against enemies, fall into traps, take damage, cast spells with particle effects, climb walls, swim, loot, role play with emotes, and more.

name: Time Alive
description: If you want to jump into some real battle, this is for you! Time Alive is an extremely big and tactical MMO-FPS / 150 Player Battle Royale game.

name: Redemptoris: Isekai
description: Bored & looking for a new game to play, Little Chan purchased Redemptoris Isekai. Not knowing what Isekai meant, she opened the game & is now trapped inside!

name: Live Bingo
description: Live Bingo is a stream interactive game of bingo designed for streamers to play with all their viewers.

name: Mother 4
description:
Announced in 2020, Mother 4 is a fan game meant to be an unofficial sequel to Mother 3, from the EarthBound (Mother, in Japan) series. In the game, the player controls an American teenager boy named Aaron and his friends in a tour in the United States to unveil the mysteries of the Rift Shells, artifacts that grant a great PSI power, and fight their way to find an obscure enemy pulling the strings in a plan with unknown purposes.

Mother 4 is the second widely known fan project to be released as a sequel for Mother 3, after the former project, which was also announced as Mother 4, was rebranded and became the indie game Oddity.

name: Diablo Junior
description: Diablo Junior was an intended prequel to Diablo, (or port of Diablo II, depending on source) to be created by Blizzard North.

name: Untamed Isles
description:
Monster hunting and taming, turn-based MMORPG.

Untamed Isles provides a living breathing world where you can witness friends and other player’s activities in real-time such as fighting, training, breeding, etc.

Untamed Isles is a game that rewards players for their achievements and to show them off publicly. Whether it be rare monsters, items, competitive raiding, ranking, achievements, player housing, and much more.

The entire world is open for you to explore. Focusing on social engagement, the level design will create unique areas for friends to gather, practice PVP, trade, breed monsters, clear dungeons and play through the story of untamed isles socially with open voice proximity communications.

name: Porcelain Eyes
description: A game about dolls.

name: Telefoot Soccer 2000
description: Telefoot Soccer 2000 is the French port of Michael Owen's WLS 2000, made in collaboration with Téléfoot.

name: RTL WLS 2000
description: RTL WLS 2000 is the German port of Michael Owen's WLS 2000. It was made in collaboration with the RTL Television.

name: Call of Saregnar
description: Call of Saregnar is a nod to the era of party-based RPGs from the 90's. Follow an intriguing story with interesting characters in a unique low-fantasy medieval setting. Enjoy a lush handcrafted 3D world that just begs to be explored. The graphics are charmingly old-school with billboard trees and a low-poly 3D world. All the characters are photographs and frame sequences of real actors, that you can interact with, see them in the world, and fight with. The combat system is a turn-based hex grid affair with many tactical options.
